thread.title: Jack Dorsey gives a third of his Twitter stock back to employees
thread.title_full: Jack Dorsey gives a third of his Twitter stock back to employees

title: Jack Dorsey gives a third of his Twitter stock back to employees
text:
Jack Dorsey gives a third of his Twitter stock back to employees 
Sydney Morning Herald Friday 23rd October, 2015 
Twitter Inc chief executive Jack Dorsey is giving a third of his Twitter stock to the company's employees, he said in a tweet on Friday.The shares amount to 1 per cent of the San Francisco-based company, worth about $US200 million....
